name: Radiation Girl - Demo
description:
Synopsis

After a white explosion, you wake up under a desk in your burning classroom! Get to the safe haven by any means necessary before you're corrupted by the radiation!

Information

Made in under three days for 1-Button Jam 2022. Cutscenes are drawn by hand. Only two areas are complete for the demo, sorry.

Controls

Aside from menus, there is only one button used to play this game. This action button can be activated using SPACE, ENTER, Z or LMB:

  • Single Tap - Dash to & attack nearest enemy
  • Double Tap - Dodge
  • Triple Tap - Activate super ability

Other controls:

  • ESC - Open Menu
  • Q (or ESC -> Settings) - Toggle Keep Window Always On Top
  • E (or ESC -> Settings) - Toggle Auto Mode

F5 to toggle fullscreen. F6 to change window size.
